message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing deal! This product is a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a steal considering its market value. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not sure about this offer. I'd like to know the quality of the product before making a decision.

Ahaha, I knew you'd be cautious! Let me tell you, this product is a real gem. I've had it appraised by experts, and it's worth every penny of the asking price. In fact, I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal on this one - I'll sell it to you for $9500, which is a steal considering its true value. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible opportunity?
I'm still unsure about the product's quality. I'd like to know more before making a decision.

Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus - a free consultation with an expert in the field to help you get the most out of your new purchase. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this incredible deal?
I'll take the product, but only if you can guarantee its quality. I want to make sure it's high-quality.
